alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 6:34PM EDT until July 26 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jackson County in south central Michigan... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 634 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Homer, or 9 miles southwest of Albion, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson... Brooklyn... Grass Lake... Vandercook Lake... Leoni... Spring Arbor... Napoleon... Sandstone... Norvell... Pulaski... Concord... Horton... Parma... Hanover... Jackson County Airpo... Oak Point... Sunset Beach... Michigan Center... Munith... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm may cause serious injury and significant property damage.
